itunes:title: Imitating Annoying Behavior
title: Imitating Annoying Behavior
itunes:author: JLML Press
itunes:subtitle: The mother of a 23-month-old girl writes that she…
itunes:summary:
The mother of a 23-month-old girl writes that she and her husband recently spent a week with some relatives and their 2.5-year-old in a shared house. This mom says her daughter had always been “a joy to be around,” but now she’s imitating the negative behavior of the other toddler, whining and yelling, and she’s wondering how to best respond.

For more on common infant/toddler parenting issues, please check out Janet's audio series "Sessions", her private recorded consultations with parents discussing their most immediate and pressing concerns. Find out more at: SessionsAudio.com.
